short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A smart emoji keyboard with semantic matching

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Emoji Keyboard for Chrome Browser

Easily copy and paste emojis into your messages. From smileys and food to animals, transport, and more—explore a wide variety of emojis!

Bring more color and personality to your communication with the Emoji Keyboard, designed especially for Chrome.

With Emoji Keyboard for Chrome, you no longer need to search emoji websites. Simply install the extension, and you’ll have quick access to the emojis you need for messages, comments, and more. It’s never been easier to express yourself!

Our extension unlocks a world of colorful emotions, making your messages more dynamic and fun. Plus, our keyboard offers different emoji styles so you can see how they look across various platforms.

The Emoji Keyboard is intuitive and easy to use—you’ll be navigating it effortlessly in no time.

Elevate your online communication with emojis always at your fingertips, no matter what you’re typing.

Remember to share the extension with your friends, leave reviews, and let us know your ideas for improving the Emoji Keyboard!
